Try the URLs cited below in the stacktrace in your browser.  See how 
your browser timeout.  Heritrix is doing the same, only, if you are 
using defaults, we retry a bunch of times in case the timeout is 
transient. 

Set down the number of retries in future crawls and they should complete 
more promptly.
St.Ack
